My name is Swapnil and I am currently working at **[zulily](https://www.zulily.com/)**, Seattle in their Marketing Analytics and Strategy team. My major responsibility at zulily is to understand customer behavior, and help marketing and strategy team optimize their efforts. A typical day at work involves working with web-analytics, demographic, transaction and spend data, designing and running statstical experiments and closely working with stakeholders.
